org.apache.NLPTools

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.NLPTools.Document
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Global

    public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
implements Global
    Class: Document This class corresponding to each document, all input documents will be represented as a 'Document' class, which will be passed to the other functional modules
    Author:
    yonghuiwu

    • Constructor Detail

      • Document

        public Document(java.lang.String itxt,
        java.lang.String fname)
        Constructor The default constructor for class 'Document'. The following functions were implemented: 1. Tokenization, split each token simply by space ' ' or '\n'. 2. Simple sentence boundary, split sentences by '\n'. The new sentence boundaries will be detected in class 'SentenceBoundary'
        Parameters:
        itxt - the input string
